TopicTitle: Am I the only one that reads signatures or what?

Articles.Content:
I found that whenever I talk to someone they talk as if they are pretty sure I own KSP, Not to long ago Devo asked if I was a tester for 0.21 and I told him why I was not and then I asked myself "Does anyone read signatures?". So I made this thread in 3 days time.

Edit: Woo! 100th post!

Edited August 2, 2013 by Pigbear
I do read signitures, i find some interesting. Also I would love to donate a gift code, although sadly i have very few money.

I read some, but most of them have ribbons, which I find kind of annoying.

EDIT: Happy 100th post!
I only read signatures which arent longer than my own.
I read any signature I see because why not.

I read some, but most of them have ribbons, which I find kind of annoying.

EDIT: Happy 100th post!

I'm sorry, wanted to have something didn't know what else to put.

I'm sorry, wanted to have something didn't know what else to put.

Don't worry.

I'm talking about those huge sigs that have 3 quotes, a company name, a flag, and on top of that, a huge ribbon thingie.

Edited August 3, 2013 by astropapi1

I almost always read signatures, as I have found that the users often pick things that are funny, are insightful, make me feel good, or reveal something about how they function. I do not like it when people fill their signature with random nonsense that just takes up space, though.

Don't worry.

I'm talking about those huge names that have 3 quotes, a company name, a flag, and on top of that, a huge ribbon thingie.

If that's the case, you should report the post or contact a moderator, there's limits for forum signature in the rules for a reason

Else yeah I do, some are interesting/funny. Mine's kinda eh.
I read them, but I really can't stand the super-sized billboards some use.

I read sigs. Mine is actually about to get bigger as rather than replace my existing ribbons, I'll be adding a new set as I am working on the equipment for a big mission I'm gonna run the grand tour in .21 so bigger sig, double ribbons. I guess that's better than the huge image that is my flag, which would make my sig longer than many of my posts
Depends. I often overlook the ribbons and corporation stuff. but i will often enough read some quotes. Quite some fine stuff there, really.

Well, now that you mentioned reading signatures, I'm reading all of the ones that show up in this thread!

I read signatures that I haven't read before or ones that I like, if I remember to.

I read them from time to time but I'm put off by the ones that are huge. As stated earlier huge ribbon stacks, and big company logo, and links to craft files.

No offense to fellow kerbnauts who have these sort of sigs.
Wow, I did not expect this to get this many replies. lol

If that's the case, you should report the post or contact a moderator, there's limits for forum signature in the rules for a reason

Else yeah I do, some are interesting/funny. Mine's kinda eh.

It would be better if the moderators (not you personally Chris) were more pro-active in removing the eyesore's we have to deal with. I personally don't know how some people manage it, there is not only a KB limit but dimensions, how they can actually post these gigantic animated sigs is beyond me - some of the ones I see take up half the page.
